#Text=Get on Track
#Text=We all need help getting organized and to stop splitting ourselves in two , trying to accomplish too much .

#Text=Whether it 's for work , school , or just daily activities , we need to approach personal organization methodically and with a sense of routine , in order to catch up with everything we need to do in our busy lives .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Utilize your time efficiently .
#Text=Perhaps you are the person who likes to have " Star Trek " playing in the background , but make sure that you do not spend too much time watching the television or just staring at the ceiling .

column1: #Text=It may be uncomfortable to sit in your chair the entire time ; you can occasionally walk around for a few minutes .
#Text=If you about an hour for one task , make sure that you are working most of the time .
#Text=Just get started , even if you are not exactly sure what to do .
#Text=Getting started is the most difficult step , and once you get started , you are much more likely to finish .
#Text=Prioritize .
#Text=Do the most important things first to ensure that they will get done , even if you know that you will not have time to do everything .
#Text=Make time to do the things you need to do first thing in the morning .
#Text=Start out by giving yourself plenty of time in the morning to get ready .
#Text=If this means getting up half an hour earlier than normal , accommodate this - simply go to bed half an hour earlier to make up for it .
#Text=You may want to read the paper , exercise or just listen to music .
#Text=Whatever it is , make this time special and uninterrupted .
#Text=Eat a good breakfast .
#Text=Do not skip this important meal that provides your with morning energy .
#Text=Make a checklist that will help you to remember what to take from the house and what to bring back home each day .
#Text=It can be a written list to begin with , and as you familiarize yourself with it , you will form a mental checklist .

#Text=Before heading to or from work , school , activities , etc. , use this checklist to make sure you have everything , such as your briefcase , backpack , purse , wallet , swimming gear , sports equipment , and notes .
#Text=Discover how you can be most productive .
#Text=Some people like to work on a project until they finish ; others need many breaks .
#Text=Some prefer long sessions ; others prefer short , concentrated sessions .
#Text=Change your perception of time by balancing things .
#Text=If you concentrate too much on one thing , one project , or one person , time may start to disappear on you .
#Text=You may have more fun if you have several projects that you are working on at once .
#Text=You probably have several tasks to tackle each day , so spend some time on one and then spend some time another .
#Text=This is especially important if you become stuck and do not know what to do next for that task .
#Text=If you take a break and come back later , you may be able to see something that you missed before .
#Text=Spread your talents , your time and your interests more widely and it will also seem as if time stretches a little to accommodate these things .
#Text=Remember not to overdo commitments , however .
#Text=This is just about making your focus wider .
#Text=Relax and unwind when you go home .
#Text=Do not rush into household chores , but relax for about an hour .
#Text=Sit down over a cup of coffee or a snack and then start to attend to other things once your relaxation time has settled you back in comfortably .
#Text=Work , chores , laundry , dinner , homework , etc. will all benefit from a rest and your rejuvenation .
#Text=Prepare for bed .
#Text=When you have finally finished your chores and activities for the day , start to get ready for bed .
#Text=If you have children , put them to bed and make a little " me " time at night .
#Text=You will want to be well rested for the next day .
#Text=Reward yourself when you finish a task or achieve one of your goals .
#Text=A reward can be something as simple as a small snack or a walk around the neighborhood .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Make sure you have enough time for all of your activities .
#Text=Avoid distractions that could wreak havoc with your entire schedule .
#Text=Are you distracted by the television or the conversations of family members ?
#Text=Find a quiet room in the house in which you can concentrate .
#Text=Stay on a schedule .
#Text=Wake up and go to sleep at about the same time each day .
#Text=That way , you can spend less time in bed trying to fall asleep or trying to get up when you are tired .
#Text=Consider eating dinner at a set time each day .
#Text=Buy a nice calendar to help you finish projects on time .
#Text=When you feel overwhelmed , do the easy tasks first .
#Text=You will be making progress ( instead of just staring and wishing that you were doing something else ) , and it will help restore your confidence .
#Text=Stay organized !
#Text=You can waste a great deal of time looking for things that are always being misplaced .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Never overwork yourself .
#Text=Forgive yourself if you occasionally get off track .
#Text=You have failed only if you do not get back on track and give up .
#Text=A day of rest may even make you more productive .
#Text=Remember that you will be very busy for some periods of time .
#Text=When you have several other important events happening in your life , you may not be able to get as much done for a while .
